quote: Be real. I'm going up against three of the world's most vicious ubervillains. I have a very, very slim chance of survival. I have a better chance of winning the lottery, and I don't even play.
quote_letters: BE REAL IM GOING UP AGAINST THREE OF THE WORLDS MOST VICIOUS UBERVILLAINS I HAVE A VERY VERY SLIM CHANCE OF SURVIVAL I HAVE A BETTER CHANCE OF WINNING THE LOTTERY AND I DONT EVEN PLAY
